abstract: landslip causing chaos for trains on main line between glasgow and edinburgh .
article: disruption is expected until the end of the day , which will cause major problems for commutersa landslip has blocked the main rail line running between glasgow and edinburgh , causing chaos for train users . the problem was reported near winchburgh in west lothian around midday , and follows a morning of cancellations and delays caused by flooding problems across the rail network . the latest fault means services between glasgow queen street and edinburgh are affected , with replacement buses taking passengers from linlithgow to edinburgh . teenager in hospital after attack outside glasgow secondary schoolservices have been reduced to half hourly , operating between queen street and linlithgow only .

as a result , ` severe delays ' are being reported by scotrail , who advise anyone travelling to the capital to do it via the queen street low level trains or the glasgow central service . police hunt for firebug who set deliberate blaze in flat closedisruption is expected until the end of the day , which will cause major problems for those who usually use the busy edinburgh to glasgow route to get home from work . for up-to-date travel info , head to the scotrail journeycheck website .
